Banner.Description: I have 1 year of experience developing systems, interfaces, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 1 year as a developer, I seek to train every day. I'm passionate about crafting efficient web applications and thrive on the challenges of Angular development. I value continuous learning, effective communication, and teamwork.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.

Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend developer
Description: Developed responsive single-page applications using Angular framework, ensuring optimal user experiences across various devices and screen sizes.
Implemented state management using tools like NgRx to maintain application state and enhance performance, resulting in smoother user interactions and reduced load times.
Integrated RESTful APIs seamlessly into Angular applications to retrieve and manipulate data from external sources, enhancing application functionality and providing real-time updates to users.

Implemented authentication and authorization mechanisms such as JWT (JSON Web Tokens) to secure API endpoints and protect sensitive data, ensuring robust security measures were in place to safeguard user information.
Leveraged Angular HttpClient module to perform HTTP requests and handle responses efficiently, optimizing network communication and improving overall performance of API interactions.
Effective communication with the design team, working with Figma.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Bureau of Civil Aviation Security
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Created Auth Module, which is responsible for creating and maintaining Staff, Airports, Entities, Zone and Assigning Modules to their Staff . Single Security Program contains one Form and one Checklist, after submitting Staff can approve and reject their form until it is finally submitted.
